events.name: Mantra Awards
events.desc:
The Mantra Awards recognize and reward outstanding students who have demonstrated extraordinary leadership potential and/or entrepreneurial initiative.
These are the categories for this initiative:

1. Mantra Award for Outstanding Leadership â€“ 2 awards (1 male, 1 female)
2. Mantra Entrepreneur of the Year Award
3. Mantra Award for Social Leadership
4. Mantra Innovator of the Year Award
